name: Demonic Jewel Dragon, Drajeweled
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/Turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Soul-Charge 2]. If all of the cards [Soul-Charge] have different grades, you may draw a card.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 4] cards with different grades], choose one of your opponent's vanguards, until end of turn, increase or decrease its [Power] to 1, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Critical]+1. ([Power] at that time becomes 1, and can increase or decrease afterwards)
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS07] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 07: Master Deckset -Michiru Hazama-

name: Demonic Stone Dragon, Jewelneel
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, [Soul-Charge 1].
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with "Drajeweled" in its card name, [Soul-Charge 1], and if your soul has three or more cards with different grades, draw a card.
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS07] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 07: Master Deckset -Michiru Hazama-

name: Jewel Core Dragon
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Demonic Stone Dragon, Jewelneel", call this card to (RC).
[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks or boosts, this unit gets [Power]+5000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, put this unit into soul. (This effect is mandatory)
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS07] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 07: Master Deckset -Michiru Hazama-

name: Jewelias Dracokid
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS07] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 07: Master Deckset -Michiru Hazama-

name: Demonic Jewel True Dragon, Drajeweled Ignis
effect:
[CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a unit with "Drajeweled" in its card name.
[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your battle phase, choose two cards from your drop, and put them into soul. Then, if your soul has four or more cards with different grades, all of your front row units get [Power]+15000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC):While you are paying the cost for this ability, you may [Soul-Blast] cards with "Drajeweled" in their card names from your soul as any grade from 0 to 4. When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 5] cards with different grades], retire all of your opponent's back row rear-guards, and until end of turn, this unit gets [Critical]+1, and increase or decrease all of your opponent's front row units' [Power] to 0.
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS07] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 07: Master Deckset -Michiru Hazama-

name: Demonic Jewel Dragon, Rystal Galer
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you [Soul-Blast 4] or more cards at the same time for the cost of your vanguard's ability this turn, [COST][put a card from hand into soul], draw a card, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it. (Usable only if you [Soul-Blast 4] or more at once)
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS07] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 07: Master Deckset -Michiru Hazama-

name: Flower of Ruined Castle, Empousa
effect: [AUTO]Front Row (RC):When you [Soul-Blast 4] or more at the same time for the cost of your vanguard's ability, if your unit did not [Stand] by a card's ability this turn, you may [Stand] this unit. If you [Stand] this unit, at the end of that turn, [COST][retire this unit], choose a grade 2 or greater unit card from your soul, and put it into hand. (The end of turn effect can only be used if you [Stand] this card by its effect)
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS07] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 07: Master Deckset -Michiru Hazama-

name: Soul Severing Demonic Spear Knight, Zagan
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) during your main phase, you may [Soul-Charge 1]. Choose up to one grade 4 card from your hand, and reveal it. If you revealed a card, or you have a grade 4 or greater vanguard with "Drajeweled" in its card name, choose up to one card from your soul with a different card name from this unit and grade less than or equal to your vanguard, and call it to (RC). At the end of that turn, put that called unit into soul.
[CONT](RC):If you have a vanguard with "Drajeweled" in its card name, this unit gets "Boost".
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS07] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 07: Master Deckset -Michiru Hazama-

effect:
